body_html: All layers support the dtype argument. But I see what you mean now. You mean "the functional interfaces to core layers don't have the dtype argument in their signature". That's right. I would suggest adding it.
body_text: All layers support the dtype argument. But I see what you mean now. You mean "the functional interfaces to core layers don't have the dtype argument in their signature". That's right. I would suggest adding it.
body: All layers support the `dtype` argument. But I see what you mean now. You mean "the functional interfaces to core layers don't have the dtype argument in their signature". That's right. I would suggest adding it.
